name: Stay Alive (omrii)
description:
Stay Alive is a top-down shooter mini game, and it's first game that I've ever finished.

I made it for a Ludum Dare's 32nd gamejam, and its theme was An Unconventional Weapon, so naturally I went with guns that shoot marshmallows.

It still has a lot of small touches that I unfortunately never got around to make but I'm sure that one day I'll come back to this game again to tweak, adjust and improve it. But until that happens, I'll consider my game in "Beta".


Controls

WASD to move around, Left Mouse Button to shoot and Right Mouse Button to dash.

http://omriimakesgames.tumblr.com/
